entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
